html:
B&H Photo has a big discount on the Litepanels Lykos+ Bi-Color LED Light today in their DealZone. You can save more than $450 on the highly-rated panel that would be great when travelling.

Litepanels makes higher-end and reliable lighting equipment, and the discount on the Lykos+ should be hard to pass-up if you’re in the market.

Purchase Options

  • Litepanels Lykos+ Bi-Color LED Light $98 (Reg $459)

Overview

  • Color 3200-5600K, CRI/TLCI: 96/96
  • Measures 10 x 6 x 2″, Dims 0-100%
  • Optional Bluetooth Module
  • AC or Optional NP-F Battery Power

With its compact 10 x 6 x 2″ form factor and color, light intensity, and power options, the Lykos+ Bi-Color LED Light from Litepanels is the perfect light for location or impromptu shooting. The Lykos+ has color temperature that’s variable from 3200 to 5600K with a high CRI/TLCI rating of 96/96 – your assurance of advanced accuracy in color rendering.

The light is dimmable too from 0 to 100%, and while you can adjust the power and color on the fixture, you can also do it wirelessly via a separately purchased Bluetooth dongle. Other valuable features are the Lykos+’s power options. You can use the fixture worldwide with the included AC adapter, but it will also run on optional NP-F-type batteries when AC current is unavailable.

  • Lightweight, slim design with a handle on the side for precision adjustment
  • Color temperature and brightness dials at your fingertips next to the handle
  • Optional Bluetooth dongle supported for adjusting color and brightness via an iPhone app
  • 48 SMT LEDs (Surface Mount Technology), designed for improved optical efficiency
  • 96 CRI: high color accuracy
  • Over 2100 Lux max brightness at 3.3′ (daylight color temperature)
  • Adjustable color temperature: 3200-5600K 
  • Flicker-free 0-100% smooth dimming with no color shift throughout the entire range
  • Color LCD display on the rear
  • L-Series battery mount
  • Two 1/4″-20 mounting threads are available: one on top, one on the bottom
  • Cold shoe for additional mounting and adding accessories such as a microphone

Purchase Options

  • Litepanels Lykos+ Bi-Color LED Light $98 (Reg $459)

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.

Craig is the founder and editorial director for Canon Rumors. He has been writing about all things Canon for more than 17 years. When he's not writing, you can find him shooting professional basketball and travelling the world looking for the next wildlife adventure. The Canon EOS R1 is his camera of choice.
